sqoop.arg: SELECT AcquisitionAttributeTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,AttributeTypeID,EntryOrder,Formula,IsExplicitStep, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionAttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,AcquisitionID,MeasurementSetTagProfileID,PartInstanceTagProfileID,DefectTagProfileID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RfDataCollectionFreqID,DataCollectionPeriod,IsRetired,AcqPlan,VMTPID,CauseActionTPID,Variant,PartTypeID,RevisionNo,IsEdited,HeadAlias,CauseTagListID,ActionTagListID,IsMeasuredWhenProduced,IsInvPackCheck,IsEBATrigger, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionSubTypeID,ActionSubType,ActionTypeID,Description,SubActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format,IsRetired, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionSubType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetID,ParentAssetID,SubAssetID,Lvl,SortOrder,Comments,AssetLevelID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,RfVarGridStyleID,IsPITCols,IsPISNoCol,RfAttrGridStyleID,IsStepGrid,IsAttrSkipStep,ShowAttrInfoTip,UseAttrImagePicker,AttrGridContextMenu,IsPISerial,AutoGenerateSerialNo,PITSampling,MSTSampling,VAInterlace,IsExplicitHS,SampleSizeMode,OnDataCommitGoTo,IsDisableOOSWarnings,StepEditPolicy,DisableKeyboardOverride,ChainToStopped,DisplayPlan,AttrPassFailDefault,VariableSaveMode,AttrCellClick, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVDataEntryOptions WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CommentsID,LoginID,DT,Subject,Comments, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Comments WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,JobCommentLength,RfTorqueDirectionID,RfCycleEndTimeID,ThresholdTorque,RfMeasurementTypeID,RfFrequencyResponseID,UnitID,AuditAngle,CrnAdapterID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CRN_AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentTypeID,DocumentType, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DocumentType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT GaugeTypeID,GaugeType, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.GaugeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineCellID,LineID,IsPartNumber,IsWONumber,IsCustomer,IsDescription,IsHeader,IsRows,ConfigLayout,IsClickable,IsStopJob,IsStartJob,IsEditable,IsStartNextJob,IsWORef1,IsWORef2,IsWORef3,IsWorkInstruction, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionGroupID,AcquisitionVariantID,Sequence,LkAGAVID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkAGAV WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkConcernRootCauseID,RootCauseID,ConcernID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernRootCause WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIProcID,WorkInstructionProcedureID,DocumentID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIProc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkLocationMachineStageId,MachineStageId,LocationId,IsLocationIn,IsLocationOut, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkLocationMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OperationTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,LkOpTMSTID,PassName, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkRootCauseActionID,RootCauseID,ActionID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkRootCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolGroupID,ToolID,LkTTGID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineGroupID,MachineGroup,Description,IsRetired,RfMachineGroupTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStopCategoryID,MachineStopCategory,Description,MachineStageTypeID,StopCategoryCode,DisplayOrder, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopCategory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenancePartUsedID,MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceProcedureResultID,PartID,Cost,DT,LoginID,Quantity,UnitID,InventoryPackID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartUsed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceReasonID,MaintenanceReason, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetRequiredID,EBATriggerID,AcquisitionContextID,MeasurementSetID,RfAcquisitionStatusID,SubmittedDT,DueDT,DeadlineDT,ExpiryDT,OwnerID,ActionID,JobID,PartID,AssignedLoginID,InventoryPackID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSetRequired WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCDigitalID,OPCItemID,Description,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCDigital WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCParameterID,OPCItemID,Description,Scale,Offset,Formula,VariableTypeID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCParameter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartClassificationID,PartClassification,RfPartClassificationID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductionStopReasonID,ProductionStopReason,Description,StopCode,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,RfStopRelativeToJobID,IsPlanned,IsDefaultNoJobReason,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonID,ScrapReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ShiftlyChecksDoneID,shiftid,jobid,fromdt,todt,partid,acquisitioncontextid,machinestageid,acquisitionvariantid,acquisitionid,downtime,uptime,total_time,datacollectionperiod,checks_req,checks_req_after_downtime,checks_done,updated_dt, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftlyChecksDone WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartControlLimitID,SPCChartComponentID,RfChartComponentID,RfChart,UCL,CL,LCL,FromDT,ToDT,RangeToDT,ModifiedDT,LoginID,RangeFromDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartControlLimit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCDefaultViewID,Sequence,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,AcquisitionUsageID,OverlayFlags, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCDefaultView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefID,TagOwnerID,RfTable,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagTreeNodeID,TagTreeNode,TagTreeID,ParentTagTreeNodeID,Depth,SortOrder,ImageURI,NoCols,NoRows,SortExpression,ImageWidth,ImageHeight, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNode WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,PartID,FromDT,ToDT,Downtime,Total_Time,Uptime, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Jobs_In_Shifts WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityStateReasonID,ToolTypeID,ToolCavityStateReason,Description,CavityStatusCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavityStateReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,StartUsingComments,ToolChangeComments,StartLoginID,ChangeLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedChangeDT,SavedStartDT,SavedChangeDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedToolUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableID,VariableTypeID,ProductID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Variable WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WOID,BaseWONumber,Txn_date,Wip_Entity_ID,Alternate_Bom,WO_Status,IsBtoCto, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WO_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Line.LineID, Line.Line, Line.Description, Line.LineTypeID, Line.IsRetired, Line.RfIntervalModeID, Line.IsOEEInventoryIsolation, Line.IsOEEInventoryReintroduction, Line.IsCountOutputInventory, Line.IsCountInputInventory, Line.IsLineInfoSweepEnabled, Line.IsWOOnSingleJob, Line.LineShortName, Line.CurrentLineInfoID, Line.LastLineInfoID, Line.RfInvCreatedDateModeID, Line.RfEndJobInvModeID, Line.CurrentJobID, Line.IsScrapAsQualityLoss, Line.IsScrapInProductionCounts, Line.LineDownCostPerHour, Line.IsContributeLineGroupOutput, Line.IsContributeLineGroupWaste, Line.IsContributeLineGroupDowntime, Line_.OEETarget, Line_.WasteTarget, Line_.Reference1, Line_.Reference2, Line_.Reference3, Line_.Reference4, Line_.Reference5, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM Line FULL JOIN Line_ ON (Line.LineID = Line_.LineID) FULL JOIN Line_Custom ON (Line.LineID = Line_Custom.LineID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
